summary: This mod fix the bug that make everyone attack to Dexion Evicus on the quest "Prophet" of Dawnguard DLC.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This is a simply bat for fix the bug that make everyone attack to Dexion Evicus on the quest "Prophet" of Dawnguard DLC (I chosen the vampires, but it may work with Dawnguards too).

-Confirmed by Shary, it works with both factions.

Install:
Just drop the vampirefix.txt in your "data" folder.

How to:
1.- Go inside the "Castle Volkihar" and you will see that everyone is atacking to Dexion
2.- Go ahead to him, when you are together open the console and click over him
3.- Write "bat vampirefix" without quotes
4.- Close the console and it will be fixed
Plus - It's possible that Dexion don't be essential and he die, if this happened after make the 2ยบ write "resurrect" without quotes and continue with the 3ยบ.
Note: You can open the console clicking ยบ
author: DF
